text: "Chicagoland" is a documentary series based in Chicago, Illinois. It is produced by Robert Redford. Its pilot episode was premiered at the 2014 Sundance Film Festival on January 19. It was aired on CNN on March 6, 2014. The documentary is about the problems facing both the city and its mayor Rahm Emanuel. The series ended on April 24, 2014. ==References== Category:2010s American television series Category:Documentary television series Category:Television series set in Chicago
title: Chicagoland (TV series)
